name: The Market
description: The Market is a fully working Marketplace. As a regular customer, you can look for any product you would like to purchase, add it to the shopping cart and process the order. As a Seller, you can register, upload your product catalog and start selling anything you want.

name: Wikidrinks
description: A fun page to learn how to prepare different drinks. Responsive design and fun way to follow recipees.

name: Handshake Community App
description: A Fullstack app to know about services around your area. Help your community promoting services around you.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A site where you can search for the current weather.

name: Note taker
description: An application to take notes, add, modify and delete.

name: Burgers Fullstack App
description: An Fullstack app to keep track of desired burgers and if you already devoured them.

name: Day Planner
description: Plan your activities for the day.
